maqras.text: Ini: "ad iddem ooue nnwen, lmelk n tmeppant i ippukelfen fellawen. Sinna, ar Mass nnwen a ppu$alem
Lemmer a pwaliv ibe$wviyen, ad brun i iqweooa nnsen, zdat Mass nnsen: "a Mass nne$! Nwala, nesla; Err ane$ a nexdem ayen ilhan. S tidep, numen
Lemmer i £ ihwi, yili Nefka, i yal ooue, nnhaya s. Maca, ad ivou wayen Nni$: "war ccekk, ad Acaoe$ Loahennama s leonun akked yimdanen, mejmulen
Ihi, jeoobet imi teppum a d temlilem d wass nnwen agi! Nekwni, ih, Neppu kwen. Jeoobet aaaqeb, n lebda, ilmend n wayen txeddmem
I iumnen kan, s issekniyen nne£, d wid, mara ten id mmektin, ara weddin ad knun, ara isbucuaen Mass nnsen s ccekoan, nitni ur pzuxxun
Ppensaren d ibeodiyen nnsen, seg imieoeen, pnujun $eo Mass nnsen, s tugwdi d usirem. Seg wayen iten N$at, pseddiqen
Ur ieoi yiwen acu i sen Ffre$ n lfeoe. D arraz n wayen llan xeddmen
Win illan d lmumen, day am win illan d amed$ul? Ur aadilen
Ihi, i wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, leonanat imoaebiyen, ara zed$en, ilmend n wayen xeddmeun
Wanag wid ide$wlen, di tmes ara zed$en. Yal tikelt ideg ara b$un a d ff$en segs, a ten rren $uoes, ad asen inin: "jeoobet aaaqeb n tmes i tnekkoem
Ih, a Nessukk fellasen aaaqeb aqoib mavi, war aaaqeb abarar. Ahat a d u$alen s abrid
Anwa i idensen sennig n win iwumi d dekoen issekniyen n Mass is, iu$al iwexxeo asen? Ih, a d Nerr ppao seg ibe$wviyen
Ni$ Nefka yas Tazmamt i Musa. Ur ppili di ccekk af temlilit yideS! Nerra p d nnhaya i At Isoail
Nesbedd, segsen, iselmaden; nnehun s lameo nne£, mi ueboen, u llan pputebbten $ef issekniyen nne£
Ih, Mass ik, Neppa, ad Ieudd garasen, ass n tnekra, $ef wayen i$ef mgarraden
Day ur ten inha ara wayen Nesqucc isuta, uqbel nnsen? La leeeun $ef tnezdu$in nnsen. Deg waya, s tidep, issekniyen. Day ur sellen ara
Day ur zoin ara Neppawi aman s akal aquoan; Nessuffu$ ed, yissen, iaaqqayen; teppen, segsen, nitni akked lmal nnsen. Day ur pwalin ara
Qqaoen: "melmi l$elb agi, ma tessawalem tidep
Ini: "ass n l$elb, liman n wid ijehlen, ur ten infaa; ur pganin
Ihi, wexxeo asen, ggani. Nitni, s tidep, la pganin
